response.original_title: Punk Rawk: Taking Back the Airwaves
response.overview: This rowdy collection of music videos, interviews and more from emo and pop-punk supergroups like AFI, Pennywise and Thursday proves that in-your-face rock 'n' roll is alive and kicking. Songs include "Feel the Pain" by Stinkaholic, "All That You Wanted" by Hangnail, "God Save Us" by Ill Ni√±o, "The Kind That Could" by Rod Laver, "Falling for You" by Student Rick, "Third Season" by AFI, "Termites Hollow" by Grade and more.
response.title: Punk Rawk: Taking Back the Airwaves
